vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰωσῆς, -ῆ (Rec. -ή Luk.3:29; AV, Jose; see: Ἰησοῦς, 3), and -ῆτος (Mk, ll with), ὁ,
Joses;
__1. brother of our Lord: Mrk.6:3, Mat.13:55 (Rec., see: Ἰωσήφ).
__2. Son of Mary: Mat.27:56 (-σήφ), WH, txt), Mrk.15:40, 47
__3. see: Βαρνάβας.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Mat.13.55;
son of: Joseph (G2501) and Mary (G3137);
brother of: Jesus (G2424), James (G2385I), Simon (G4613H) and Jude (G2455I); also called Joses at Mrk.6.3; 15.47;
vocabinfos._es_Definition: José: (1) hermano de Jesús ; (2) hermano de Santiago/Jacobo el menor (MAR.15:40,47)
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約西 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "被尊崇"
1) 基督的先祖 (路 3:29)
2) 耶穌的兄弟 (可 6:3)
3) 耶穌的姨媽也叫馬利亞,有個兒子叫約西 (太27:56; 可 15:40,47)
4) 早期教會成員之一, 但是以巴拿巴為人所知 (徒 4:36, 和合本此處譯作"約瑟")
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约西这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是"被尊崇"
1) 基督的先祖(路3:29)
2) 耶稣的兄弟(可6:3)
3)耶稣的姨妈也叫马利亚,有个儿子叫约西(太27:56; 可15:40,47)
4) 早期教会成员之一, 但是以巴拿巴为人所知(徒4: 36, 和合本此处译作"约瑟")

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Mat.27.56; his mother was Mary (G3137H);
brother of: James (G2385J) and Salome (G4539); also called Joses at Mrk.15.40; 16.1;

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.4.36; his mother was Mary (G3137P) ;
brother of: Mary (G3137L); also called Joseph (KJV: Joses) at Act.4.36;
